name: Hot Wheels Clippers

name: Toy Guns
description: We meticulously choose toy weapons before offering you. All weapons are strong and safe, but nevertheless do not neglect safety measures. Do not shoot toy pistols with bullets at people or animals. Use caution when using caps. Store consultants are always ready to help you choose toy guns for your child.   Подробнее: https://poomba.kz/g615226-igrushechnye-pistolety

name: My Little Pony
description: Funny animals with big smart eyes and cute faces want to make friends with your baby! The Littlest Pet Shop collection includes a huge variety of animals, both domestic and wild - everyone can find a pet to their liking, and cute swinging heads will not leave anyone indifferent. The child can not part with his favorite toy, because the dimensions allow you to put it in your pocket and carry it everywhere with you. So that the animal is not bored, your baby can collect a collection of friends for him! Now the series also includes the cute Blythe doll, which will help the child look after the pets. Подробнее: https://poomba.kz/g482208-littlest-pet-shop
